# Ignore sensitive information files
*.env
*.key
*.pem
*.cert
*.p12
*.pfx
*.jks
*.keystore

# Ignore secret configuration files
config/secrets.yml
config/database.yml
config/application.yml

# Ignore log and cache files
*.log
*.cache
*.tmp
*.bak

# Ignore build and dependency directories
node_modules/
vendor/
dist/
build/
target/

# Ignore IDE and editor config files
*.iml
*.idea/
*.vscode/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore backup files
*.bak
*.swp
*.swo
*.old
*.orig
*.save

# Ignore deployment files
/deploy/
